name: Retro Museum
description: A virtual museum to document my journey through all things vintage and retro!
features: Dynamically upload content via json files located in the data folder!

name: Study
description: Create, share, and use decks of flash cards to help you study for anything you need to learn!
features: Without needing an account, view all the public flash card decks as you wish!
With an account, you can create your own public or private flash card decks
Update your previously created decks at the click of a button
Search the database for any decks that might interest you

name: Stocks
description: Research stocks, create a watchlist, and even play around with paper trading!
features: You can use the sites full text search to find your desired stocks
Add your favorite stocks to your watchlist

name: Photos
description: Show off all your favorite photos with this super simple webapp! It's easy to customize, just replace the google photos album links in src/albums.json with your desired links, and all your favorite photos will be shown when the page is loaded!
features: Loads any given google photo album links

name: Valorant Rank Tracker | Who Are You
description: A fully from scratch app that shows users who they are up against when playing the popular Riot Games title, VALORANT
features: Discover who you are up against!

name: Calculator
description: A sleek and modern calculator app the features a basic calculator, an Interest calculator, and a loan calculator!
features: Calculate basic math problems, how much you would make with a savings account, or how much a loan will cost you all with this handy, sleek, and modern tool!

name: URL Shortner
description: A simple-to-use URL shortner for creating convenient URLs
features: Easily enter any URL into the input and recieve a convenient and hopefully shorter one back
Any URL already existing in the database will simply just send back the same URL if attempted to be shortened again

name: Web-based Code Editor V2
description: A simple code editor that can run dozens of languages!

name: Wordle Clone
description: A clone of the famous 'Wordle' game!

name: Github Profile Themed Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio made to replicate the style of a Github Profile. This portfolio showcases skills, projects, and certificates.
features: Quick access to contact, CV, and socials
Crafted to look like a Github Profile, down to the exact hex values

name: Tux Jobs
description: TuxJobs is my groups' final project for our Mobile Applications course.
features: Job postings presented as a swipeable card, swipe left to reject and swipe right to save
History page with filters made to simplify the job application process
Settings page allowing users to enable and disable special options such as "Cat Naps", "Swipe Ratio Warning", and "Job Entry Expiration"

name: Trivia! (Web)
description: React app that takes advantage of Opentdb API to provide a simple and fun game to the user.
features: Able to filter questions by Category, Difficulty, and Type

name: Recipes API and Web App
description:
Python Flask Web App that communicates with a custom API built in Node
Note: App was converted to a React and Firebase app due to Heroku depricating their free tier
features: Simplified, straight to the point, recipes

name: Original Portfolio
description: Python Flask Web App that acted as my original portfolio, allowing visitors to view my projects, certificates, and contact information
features: View my projects, certificates, and contact information

name: Programming Blog
description: A simple blog that allows users to create, edit, and delete blog posts.
features: Custom Messaging System along with Email
Custom Live HTML Editor for Creating Posts

name: STEM Access For All
description: STEM Access For All is a nonprofit organization that provides free access to STEM education to students in underserved communities. The organization works with schools, community colleges, and universities to provide free access to STEM education to students in underserved communities.
features: Custom Messaging System along with Email support
